metadata.title: CVE-2022-0373 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper access control in GitLab CE/EE versions 12.4 to 14.5.4, 14.5 to14.6.4, and 12.6 to 14.7.1 allows project non-members to retrieve theservice desk email address

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
